version.name: v1
version.xform: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?> <xf:xforms xmlns:xf="http://www.w3.org/2002/xforms" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <xf:model> <xf:instance id="child"> <child id="2" name="CWC Visit"> <staffId/> <facilityId/> <date/> <motechId/> <immunization/> <bcg/> <opvdose/> <pentadose/> <yellowfever/> <csm/> <measles/> <iptidose/> <vitaminA/> <dewormer/> <weight/> <muac/> <height/> <maleInvolved/> <cwcLocation/> <house/> <community/> <comments/> <formtype>data_entry</formtype> <formname>childcwc-jf</formname> </child> </xf:instance> <xf:bind id="staffId" nodeset="/child/staffId" required="true()" type="xsd:int" constraint=". < 2147483647" message="Number too large. Keep under 2147483647"/> <xf:bind id="facilityId" nodeset="/child/facilityId" required="true()" type="xsd:int" constraint=". < 2147483647" message="Number too large. Keep under 2147483647"/> <xf:bind constraint=". <= 'today()'" id="date" message="Invalid date: date specified is in the future" nodeset="/child/date" required="true()" type="xsd:date"/> <xf:bind id="motechId" nodeset="/child/motechId" required="true()" type="xsd:int" constraint=". > 999999 and . < 10000000" message="MoTeCH ID must be 7 digits long"/> <xf:bind id="immunization" nodeset="/child/immunization" required="true()" type="xsd:string"/> <xf:bind action="show" id="bcg" nodeset="/child/bcg" relevant="/child/immunization = 'Y'" required="true()" type="xsd:string" visible="false()"/> <xf:bind action="show" id="opvdose" nodeset="/child/opvdose" relevant="/child/immunization = 'Y'" required="true()" type="xsd:string" visible="false()"/> <xf:bind action="show" id="pentadose" nodeset="/child/pentadose" relevant="/child/immunization = 'Y'" required="true()" type="xsd:string" visible="false()"/> <xf:bind action="show" id="yellowfever" nodeset="/child/yellowfever" relevant="/child/immunization = 'Y'" required="true()" type="xsd:string" visible="false()"/> <xf:bind action="show" id="csm" nodeset="/child/csm" relevant="/child/immunization = 'Y'" required="true()" type="xsd:string" visible="false()"/> <xf:bind action="show" id="measles" nodeset="/child/measles" relevant="/child/immunization = 'Y'" required="true()" type="xsd:string" visible="false()"/> <xf:bind id="iptidose" nodeset="/child/iptidose" required="true()" type="xsd:string"/> <xf:bind id="vitaminA" nodeset="/child/vitaminA" required="true()" type="xsd:string"/> <xf:bind id="dewormer" nodeset="/child/dewormer" required="true()" type="xsd:string"/> <xf:bind constraint=". >= 1 and . <= 80" id="weight" message="Value out of range: must be between 1 and 80" nodeset="/child/weight" type="xsd:decimal"/> <xf:bind constraint=". >= 5 and . <= 25" id="muac" message="Value out of range: must be between 5 and 25" nodeset="/child/muac" type="xsd:decimal"/> <xf:bind constraint=". >= 26 and . <= 160" id="height" message="Value out of range: must be between 26 and 160" nodeset="/child/height" type="xsd:decimal"/> <xf:bind id="maleInvolved" nodeset="/child/maleInvolved" required="true()" type="xsd:string"/> <xf:bind id="cwcLocation" nodeset="/child/cwcLocation" required="true()" type="xsd:string"/> <xf:bind action="show" id="house" nodeset="/child/house" relevant="/child/cwcLocation = '2'" required="true()" type="xsd:string" visible="false()"/> <xf:bind action="show" id="community" nodeset="/child/community" relevant="/child/cwcLocation = '2'" required="true()" type="xsd:string" visible="false()"/> <xf:bind id="comments" nodeset="/child/comments" type="xsd:string"/> <xf:bind id="formtype" nodeset="/child/formtype" required="true()" type="xsd:string" visible="false()"/> <xf:bind id="formname" nodeset="/child/formname" required="true()" type="xsd:string" visible="false()"/> </xf:model> <xf:group id="1"> <xf:label>Page4</xf:label> <xf:input bind="staffId"> <xf:label>Staff ID</xf:label> </xf:input> <xf:input bind="facilityId"> <xf:label>Facility ID</xf:label> </xf:input> <xf:input bind="date"> <xf:label>Visit date</xf:label> </xf:input> <xf:input bind="motechId"> <xf:label>MoTeCH ID</xf:label> </xf:input> <xf:select1 bind="immunization"> <xf:label>Immunization</xf:label> <xf:item id="Y"> <xf:label>Yes</xf:label> <xf:value>Y</xf:value> </xf:item> <xf:item id="N"> <xf:label>No</xf:label> <xf:value>N</xf:value> </xf:item> </xf:select1> <xf:select1 bind="bcg"> <xf:label>BCG</xf:label> <xf:item id="Y"> <xf:label>Yes</xf:label> <xf:value>Y</xf:value> </xf:item> <xf:item id="N"> <xf:label>No</xf:label> <xf:value>N</xf:value> </xf:item> </xf:select1> <xf:select1 bind="opvdose"> <xf:label>OPV</xf:label> <xf:item id="NA"> <xf:label>None given</xf:label> <xf:value>NA</xf:value> </xf:item> <xf:item id="0"> <xf:label>OPV 0</xf:label> <xf:value>1</xf:value> </xf:item> <xf:item id="1"> <xf:label>OPV 1</xf:label> <xf:value>1</xf:value> </xf:item> <xf:item id="2"> <xf:label>OPV 2</xf:label> <xf:value>2</xf:value> </xf:item> <xf:item id="3"> <xf:label>OPV 3</xf:label> <xf:value>3</xf:value> </xf:item> </xf:select1> <xf:select1 bind="pentadose"> <xf:label>Penta</xf:label> <xf:item id="NA"> <xf:label>None given</xf:label> <xf:value>NA</xf:value> </xf:item> <xf:item id="1"> <xf:label>Penta 1</xf:label> <xf:value>1</xf:value> </xf:item> <xf:item id="2"> <xf:label>Penta 2</xf:label> <xf:value>2</xf:value> </xf:item> <xf:item id="3"> <xf:label>Penta 3</xf:label> <xf:value>3</xf:value> </xf:item> </xf:select1> <xf:select1 bind="yellowfever"> <xf:label>Yellow Fever</xf:label> <xf:item id="Y"> <xf:label>Yes</xf:label> <xf:value>Y</xf:value> </xf:item> <xf:item id="N"> <xf:label>No</xf:label> <xf:value>N</xf:value> </xf:item> </xf:select1> <xf:select1 bind="csm"> <xf:label>CSM</xf:label> <xf:item id="Y"> <xf:label>Yes</xf:label> <xf:value>Y</xf:value> </xf:item> <xf:item id="N"> <xf:label>No</xf:label> <xf:value>N</xf:value> </xf:item> </xf:select1> <xf:select1 bind="measles"> <xf:label>Measles</xf:label> <xf:item id="Y"> <xf:label>Yes</xf:label> <xf:value>Y</xf:value> </xf:item> <xf:item id="N"> <xf:label>No</xf:label> <xf:value>N</xf:value> </xf:item> </xf:select1> <xf:select1 bind="iptidose"> <xf:label>IPTi</xf:label> <xf:item id="NA"> <xf:label>None given</xf:label> <xf:value>NA</xf:value> </xf:item> <xf:item id="1"> <xf:label>IPTi 1</xf:label> <xf:value>1</xf:value> </xf:item> <xf:item id="2"> <xf:label>IPTi 2</xf:label> <xf:value>2</xf:value> </xf:item> <xf:item id="3"> <xf:label>IPTi 3</xf:label> <xf:value>3</xf:value> </xf:item> </xf:select1> <xf:select1 bind="vitaminA"> <xf:label>Vitamin A</xf:label> <xf:item id="Y"> <xf:label>Yes</xf:label> <xf:value>Y</xf:value> </xf:item> <xf:item id="N"> <xf:label>No</xf:label> <xf:value>N</xf:value> </xf:item> </xf:select1> <xf:select1 bind="dewormer"> <xf:label>Dewormer</xf:label> <xf:item id="Y"> <xf:label>Yes</xf:label> <xf:value>Y</xf:value> </xf:item> <xf:item id="N"> <xf:label>No</xf:label> <xf:value>N</xf:value> </xf:item> </xf:select1> <xf:input bind="weight"> <xf:label>Weight (kg)</xf:label> </xf:input> <xf:input bind="muac"> <xf:label>MUAC (cm)</xf:label> </xf:input> <xf:input bind="height"> <xf:label>Height (cm)</xf:label> </xf:input> <xf:select1 bind="maleInvolved"> <xf:label>Male involvement</xf:label> <xf:item id="Y"> <xf:label>Yes</xf:label> <xf:value>Y</xf:value> </xf:item> <xf:item id="N"> <xf:label>No</xf:label> <xf:value>N</xf:value> </xf:item> </xf:select1> <xf:select1 bind="cwcLocation"> <xf:label>Location</xf:label> <xf:item id="1"> <xf:label>Facility or clinic</xf:label> <xf:value>1</xf:value> </xf:item> <xf:item id="2"> <xf:label>Home</xf:label> <xf:value>2</xf:value> </xf:item> <xf:item id="3"> <xf:label>Outreach</xf:label> <xf:value>3</xf:value> </xf:item> <xf:item id="4"> <xf:label>School</xf:label> <xf:value>4</xf:value> </xf:item> </xf:select1> <xf:input bind="house"> <xf:label>House</xf:label> </xf:input> <xf:input bind="community"> <xf:label>Community</xf:label> </xf:input> <xf:input bind="comments"> <xf:label>Comments</xf:label> </xf:input> <xf:input bind="formtype"> <xf:label>formType</xf:label> </xf:input> <xf:input bind="formname"> <xf:label>formName</xf:label> </xf:input> </xf:group> </xf:xforms>
version.layout: <Form id="2"> <Page Text="Page4" Binding="Page4" Width="100%" Height="790px" backgroundColor=""> <Item WidgetType="Label" Text="Enter your CHPS ID" HelpText="Staff ID"
